name: Balloon Rescue (ToroidGames)
description:
In Balloon Rescue you will save survivors from a building that is gripped by a furious fire.
Along your way you will encounter fireballs, firepits and puzzles to solve while also having to choose your course carefully as there is only limited fuel.

Pit your wits against the treacherous fires and puzzling levels. Rescue all survivors then make your way back to the exit. Fun for all ages.

Features include:
- 21 Gripping levels.
- Fuel Gauge for keeping an eye on your fuel.
- Ability to Remove Adverts and Buy Lives.
- Game Saves.
- High Score Hall of Fame
- Full Instructions and Tutorial
- Fun for all the family!
